pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plan----Cron jobs in Python.Plan is easy````````````Save in a schedule.py:.. code:: python from plan import Plan cron = Plan() cron.command('ls /tmp', every='1.day', at='12:00') cron.command('pwd', every='2.month') cron.command('date', every='weekend') if __name__ == "__main__": cron.run()And run it:.. code:: bash $ pip install plan $ python schedule.pyLinks`````* `documentation <http://plan.readthedocs.org/>`_* `github <https://github.com/fengsp/plan>`_* `development version <http://github.com/fengsp/plan/zipball/master#egg=plan-dev>`_
